In order to facilitate the use of the `dynr` package, we have created an Rstudio Server [Docker](https://www.docker.com/) container based on the [Rocker Project](https://rocker-project.org/) [@Rocker2017; @Rocker2020], with the `dynr` package pre-installed.

- [Windows using WSL 2](../docker/docker-win.qmd)
- [macOS](../docker/docker-mac.qmd)
